remarks: Member of a projective map.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2012.)
statement:
pmapfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pmapfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapfval.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
elpmap $p |- ( ( K e. C /\ X e. B ) -> ( P e. ( M ` X ) <-> ( P e. A /\ P .<_ X ) ) ) $.
